message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I know it's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay no more than $11,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,500. This still gives you a good deal considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to pay $11,200 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
